layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x160
  RenderBlock {test} at (0,0) size 800x160
    RenderBlock {div} at (0,0) size 800x144
      RenderBlock {q} at (0,0) size 800x16 [color=#FF0000]
        RenderInline {r} at (0,0) size 123x16 [color=#00FF00]
          RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 123x16
            text run at (0,0) width 123: "This text should be"
        RenderText {#text} at (122,0) size 5x16
          text run at (122,0) width 5: " "
        RenderInline {r} at (0,0) size 122x16 [color=#00FF00]
          RenderText {#text} at (126,0) size 122x16
            text run at (126,0) width 122: "in green characters"
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
      RenderBlock {s} at (0,32) size 800x16 [color=#00FF00]
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 248x16
          text run at (0,0) width 248: "This text should be in green characters"

        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 248x16

        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 248x16
